Audiovisual platform for African cinema: Audiovisual platform for African cinema and television. It is the production, distribution and commercialization laboratory for film and television, with experience in event creation and cultural management.
The production root whose main mission i: The production root whose main mission is to make cinema and promote African cinema, stories related to AFRICA and Africans in Spain and in Spanish language.
Specialized in quality African film and: Specialized in quality African film and television
Creation and distribution of original au: Creation and distribution of original audiovisual content
Organization of cultural events and film: Organization of cultural events and film festivals
Dissemination of stories related to Afri: Dissemination of stories related to Africa in Spanish language
At Moaba Cinema TV we believe in the pow: At Moaba Cinema TV we believe in the power of cinema as a cultural bridge between Africa and the Hispanic world. Through audiovisual media, we seek to break barriers, tear down stereotypes and showcase the cultural richness of the African continent.
We work to create a space where African: We work to create a space where African stories can be told with authenticity and respect, reaching new audiences through the Spanish language.
If you are interested in African cinema,: If you are interested in African cinema, want to distribute your film or have an idea for an audiovisual project related to Africa, we would love to hear from you.
